text: Myrae or Myrai () was a town of Magnesia, ancient Thessaly, on the Aegean coast between Eurymenae and Homolion.Periplus of Pseudo-Scylax, p. 24. Eurymenae was located between Rhizus and Myrae. The town's location has not been ascertained. ==References== Category:Ancient Magnesia Category:Populated places in ancient Thessaly Category:Former populated places in Greece Category:Lost ancient cities and towns
title: Myrae
